code: import{useDispatch as useReduxDispatch,useSelector as useReduxSelector}from'react-redux';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import reducers from'./reducers';var store=configureStore({reducer:reducers,devTools:true});export var useSelector=useReduxSelector;export var useDispatch=function useDispatch(){return useReduxDispatch();};var persister=persistStore(store);export{store,persister};
